[WHO ELSE COULD DO IT BUT ME???]

*You: WHO ELSE COULD DO IT BUT ME???

*Z: ...

*Z: ...

*Z: ...It's true.

*Z: If I regretted my actions so much that I defied time itself to reverse them... then I will trust my own judgment, as always. I am disarming the pathogen dispenser as we speak.

*Z: This was a ridiculous diversion, anyway. I will get to work at once on the true masterpiece of my career, which you have revealed to me. Thank you for opening my eyes.

*Z: Please return to your time. I must do this myself.

He hangs up. A minute passes, then another. The end of the world doesn't come.

You have achieved Ending S: Savior of the Timeline
